attributes.additional_details:
Due to the amount of crime happening in the local area I am starting this petition in aid of re-opening Canvey Police Station.

As i am sure you are all aware we have been experiencing a lot of burglaries lately as well as stabbings and muggings. We have now been told that our street lights will be turned off at night and I am worried for the safety of the residents of Canvey.

Please sign the petition below if you agree that the police station should be reopened.

Thanks

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
